SEARCH

Class UserDao

java.lang.Object
UserDao
public class UserDao extends Object
The UserDao class is responsible for handling all database operations related to the User entity (e.g., creating, reading, updating, and deleting users). The class provides methods for creating, reading, updating, and deleting user records in the database. It also provides methods for retrieving user records based on their ID or email, as well as verifying user passwords.

    Description
    UserDao(Connection connection)
    Constructs a new UserDao object with the specified database connection.

    Description

    getConnection()
    Returns the connection object used by the UserDao.
    User
    getUserByEmail(String email)
    Get the User by their designated Email, gets their User information By Querying in SQL to select all from users where the Email is equal to the Email submitted.
    User
    getUserByID(int id)
    Get the User by their designated ID, gets their User information By Querying in SQL to select all from users where the ID is equal to the ID submitted.
    boolean
    passwordVerification(String email, String password)
    Verify the password of a given user, SELECTs their password from the users where their Email is equal to the Email submitted, then compares the hashed password with the given password.
    boolean
    updateUser(User user)
    Updates the User information in the database based on the provided User object.

    • getUserByID

      public User getUserByID(int id)
      Get the User by their designated ID, gets their User information By Querying in SQL to select all from users where the ID is equal to the ID submitted.

    • getUserByEmail

      public User getUserByEmail(String email)
      Get the User by their designated Email, gets their User information By Querying in SQL to select all from users where the Email is equal to the Email submitted.

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(User user)
      Updates the User information in the database based on the provided User object.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the updated information.
      Returns:
      true if the User information was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser(int id)
      Deletes a user from the database based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • passwordVerification

      public boolean passwordVerification(String email, String password)
      Verify the password of a given user, SELECTs their password from the users where their Email is equal to the Email submitted, then compares the hashed password with the given password.
